vivae.controllers

Class KeyboardVivaeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • vivae.controllers.VivaeController
      • vivae.controllers.KeyboardVivaeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class KeyboardVivaeController
extends VivaeController
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    An extension of VivaeController for controlling Active ArenaParts by Keyboard. This type of controller needs to be added as a KeyListener to the parent window of the Arena.
